title: gati pera unnai
sahitya:
gati pera unnai nAn tudi sheidu varuvadai iduvarai En murugA madiyAdirukkirAi


anupallavi

  vidhiyin viLaivinAl eduvarinum adanAl mati kulaindayarAmal mana urudiyODuidu


caraNam    kadiravan udittadum kadiroLi virittadum kAriruL maraindaghala pAridu sirandiDumE
adanaip-pOl endan cintai iruL maraiyavE udavum undanadu padamE shatamenbEn
